item.title: The Air War
item.description: Link The Plan This Week We are about 4 weeks out from Election Day, and thus far I’ve created a national forecasting model that incorporates national economic conditions (Gross Domestic Product, Real Disposable Income, and unemployment), generic ballot polling (partisan preference), and the midterm-president’s-party effect. I’ve also created a simple district-level forecasting model based on expert ratings ([Cook Political Report](https://www.cookpolitical.com/ratings/house-race -ratings), Inside Elections, and Sabato’s Crystal Ball). This week I plan to explore the impact of advertisements (volume, cost) on the outcomes of congressional races.
